title: alexgrace
author: alexgrace
content: GetBlock has launched an affiliate program that allows crypto enthusiasts to monetize their social media presence by introducing top-tier RPC node providers to new developers With this program, GetBlock Affiliates can earn up to 20% of the fees paid by their referrals. The minimum payout threshold is $50, and participants can withdraw their earnings once their referral balance reaches this amount.For more information, please check this link:https://getblock.io/affiliate-program/
